NIce upload. You should put a space in between LA & NOIRE. Leave the .'s out. Its harder to find that way bob. Also, work on your tagging.
Tags couldve included. Modded, game, xbox, 360, xbox360, abgx, region free, etc etc. Other than that, looks great. Your learning a lot. I need to start uploading here. 

You should also check out...
http://netforbeginners.about.com/od/peersharing/tp/The-Top-20-Torrent-Sites-Visual-Guide.htm

Start uploading to a private site also. TPB is a public BT site, and people Leech alot. On a private site, people are more open to leaving comments, and helping out. Leeching on these "private" sites will get you banned. HEHE.

Oh, btw stay away from fenopy.com. They suck.

Check this out, lol. 
http://www.google.com/search?sourceid=chrome&ie=UTF-8&q=LANOIRE+tpb
